edu.cnm.deepdive.mealplanit

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.mealplanit.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends Object
    The Main Activity for the entire application that controls the functions of the fragments for AccountFragment and CalendarFragment. getDatabase() has the method to get an instance of the MealDatabase and getRetrofit() is a method that gets a builder pattern of Retrofit. Author Donny Stout - version 1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MealDatabase getDatabase()
      Getting an instance of the MealDatabase and if empty gets the Context and builds the database before returning the database.
      Retrofit getRetrofit()
      Checks to see if retrofit already exists, if not it builds a pattern for Retrofit that allows for the service call MealList and MealList.Meal and converts it with GsonConverterFactory to a Gson object.
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu) 
      boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)

      • getDatabase

        public MealDatabase getDatabase()
        Getting an instance of the MealDatabase and if empty gets the Context and builds the database before returning the database.
        Returns:
        Mealdatabase.

      • getRetrofit

        public Retrofit getRetrofit()
        Checks to see if retrofit already exists, if not it builds a pattern for Retrofit that allows for the service call MealList and MealList.Meal and converts it with GsonConverterFactory to a Gson object. If it does exist it returns that instance of retrofit.
        Returns:
        A built retrofit object.
